messages.subject: Re: Pagans
messages.msgSnippet: ... Sorry for my ignorance, but does pagan refer to a specific belief system or religion, or does it just mean non-Christian  ? Our family is sort of a
messages.messageBody:
>
>Are there any Pagan families on this list?
>
>Nanci K.

Sorry for my ignorance, but does "pagan" refer to a specific belief system
or religion, or does it just mean "non-Christian" ?

Our family is sort of a non-religous mix of spirituality. As in we believe
in and teach our children about the force of God, good or just the force
(may the force be with you...) We shy away from being too preachy or
formal, though, prefering to keep all discussions about God or Spirit open
ended and inquiring.

Not sure weather this qualify us as pagan...
